channel.title: 508 Client help
channel.description:
When i run the client i get this
`Java` is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue... ----------------------------------------------------------------- And this is what in file has inside it. ----------------------------------------------------------------- @echo off cd src java -Xmx256m client 1 live live software members english game1 pause
